name: Hexagonal 4-in-a-low Multiplay
description:
1play3min!

Between work!
In the break!
Cerebral training!

Please play by a background!

Four connect(4 In a low) game on the hex board.

"If 3 connect, Lose." is added to the usual four connect game rule.
Concentration and the computational ability are an important game!

You can play with a family and a friend. Of course even one of you can be idle, and people of the world are waiting for your participation in a match‼

Hereinafter there are 2 modes.
■ Computer AI
■ Online Multiplay

For a computer, a partner doesn't fail in a AI confrontation.
When the level of AI is made expensive, it'll be the strongest enemy. I think I'm often defeated in the difference in the concentration.

You can take on a player of all over the world at an Online Mode.
It's possible to compete for a trophy! I'll aim at best in the world!
It's indistinct in a platform and an area, so it can be true best in the world!
